heading: Tonight
text: Snow showers ending south, diminishing late north. Partial clearing west and south of I-89, more clouds northeast. Lows 5 below to 5 above zero. Northwest winds near 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Some morning clouds northeast, then morning sun giving way to increasing afternoon clouds. Some snow showers in NY into western VT later in the day. Highs 10 to 15 north, 15 to 20 south. Winds light and variable.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Periods of clouds, with a few snow showers, mainly in the north and mountains. Becoming partly cloudy in southern valleys. Lows 5 above to 5 below zero. Winds light and variable.
